formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A complete system crash occurs on an empty namespace.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The clean_env is not declared in the module, giving a null return result that causes a crash when passed unchecked to the BuildCall function. We add a check to handle this null case so that it does not result in a crash. Additionally, we declare the clean_env function as a part of the runtime. Furthermore, an additional error in the way that the environments are cleaned up here is fixed, by ensuring that the size stored for the environment is actually a value reference, and not an APL value.
